title: The Empty nest

description: Tells of the threat of extinction to the osprey (fish hawk); since 1950, 90% of these birds have vanished due to the effects of pesticides. Studies the bird's courtship, rearing of young, flight patterns and habits. Tells of the effects of pesticides in relation to the food chain.
